title: Expert React 3-in-1 Developer Bundle 2025: Become a Reactjs expert!
description: Three comprehensive React courses bundled with hands-on projects and examples to take you from fundamentals to advanced, production-ready React development.

title: Learn Advanced React: Online Coding Notebook
description: A focused advanced React notebook with practical patterns, hooks, and architecture tips to build scalable, high-performance components and apps.

title: Learn React + Firebase + Redux: Intermediate React Coding Notebook
description: Hands-on intermediate projects showing how to integrate React with Firebase backends and Redux state management to build authenticated, data-driven applications.

title: Learn React.js Basics - Complete Coding Notebook
description: A complete beginner-friendly React notebook covering components, props, state, and basic app structure with runnable examples and exercises.

title: Learn TypeScript Fundamentals: Comprehensive Coding Notebook
description: Introductory TypeScript lessons with examples and exercises to help you add static types, catch errors early, and write more maintainable JavaScript code.

title: Master JavaScript 2024: 2 Coding Notebooks
description: Two concise notebooks covering modern JavaScript features, best practices, and practical exercises to sharpen your JS knowledge for 2024.

title: NodeJS Mastery 2024 - 3 Digital Coding Notebooks
description: Three hands-on Node.js notebooks teaching server-side JavaScript, API development, and deployment workflows to build reliable backend services.

title: TensorFlow 2 Mastery - 1 Jupyter/Colab Python Coding Notebook
description: A runnable Jupyter/Colab notebook that teaches TensorFlow 2 fundamentals with example models and exercises for building and training neural networks.
